flawed_nl_solution:
To treat his 20 dogs, Mr. Sean charged Khalil 20*$60 = $<<20*60=1200>>1200
Khalil also paid $40*60 = $<<40*60=24000>>24000 to Mr. Sean to treat his cats.
Altogether, Khalil paid Mr. Sean $24000+$1200 = $<<24000+1200=25200>>25200 to treat his pets.
#### 25200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 24000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
